accessibilityHint.description:
An accessibility hint helps users understand what will happen when they perform an action on the
accessibility element when that result is not clear from the accessibility label
accessibilityHint.name: accessibilityHint

accessibilityLabel.description: VoiceOver will read this string when a user selects the associated element
accessibilityLabel.name: accessibilityLabel

autoFocus.description: Automatically focus the input after it is rendered
autoFocus.name: autoFocus

onChange.description: A callback function that handles the update of the new value of the property value.
onChange.name: onChange

onDebouncedChange.description:
A callback function that handles the API call to search the value. This is where the
wait value is applied to the debounce function to give a delay in each input and API request.
onDebouncedChange.name: onDebouncedChange

placeholder.description: Hint text that goes above the value once the field is filled out
placeholder.name: placeholder

prefix.description: Symbol to display before the text input
prefix.name: prefix

ref.name: ref

value.description: Set the component to a given value
value.name: value

wait.description:
A numeric value to represents the milliseconds in delaying the function to populate
the data source when the 'value' changed.
wait.name: wait
